The study compare conventional reduced-fat , high carbohydrate diet 3 mean reduce glycemic load : changing carbohydrates low-GI choice , replace carbohydrate protein , combine effect produce low glycemic load .
DOC.brief_title: Glycemic Load , Weight Loss Cardiovascular Disease Risk
DOC.detailed_description: Conventional low fat diet produce modest wegiht loss best result well maintain . More recently interest low glycemic index high protien diet wiht evidence produce good fat loss improvement cardiovascular risk factor . This trial aim evaluate different approach compare outcomes 12 week . Major outcome weigth loss , body composition change , blood lipid change , measure glucose homeostasis , insulin resistance , leptin CRP .
